description: A non-authoritative, navigational index for locating and classifying documents in a Sociotechnical Constitution. This schema cannot express legitimacy, compliance, permission, approval, readiness, or satisfaction. It exists only to help humans and machines find the correct source of authority.

nonAuthoritative.description: This index has no authority. It must never be used to justify action, enforcement, deployment, gating, or claims of compliance.

pattern.description: Descriptive identifier only. This field does not grant or imply legitimacy.

documents.description: List of documents in the constitution. Presence, absence, or ordering does not imply validity, compliance, permission, or approval.

summary.description: Optional human-readable summary. Must not be interpreted as guidance or policy.

documentType.description: Classification only. This does not grant authority or priority.

authorityLevel.description: Relative authority description for navigation and citation hygiene only. This field must not be used to enable decisions.

referencesInvariants.description: References to constitutional invariants by identifier only. Referential; implies no compliance or satisfaction.

tags.description: Optional free-form tags to support navigation and search.

owner.description: Human-readable owner or steward of the document. Informational only.

lastModified.description: Last modification date (ISO 8601 recommended). Informational only.

notes.description: Optional human notes. Must not be interpreted as rules, policy, or guidance.
